entry.name: callbacks.fireWith
entry.title: callbacks.fireWith()

argument.name: context
argument.desc: A reference to the context in which the callbacks in the list should be fired.

argument.name: args
argument.desc: An argument, or array of arguments, to pass to the callbacks in the list.

entry.desc: Call all callbacks in a list with the given context and arguments.

longdesc.p: This method returns the Callbacks object onto which it is attached (this).
Use callbacks.fireWith() to fire a list of callbacks with a specific context and an array of arguments:
